amendment.description: An amendment to the preamble, striking "training" and inserting "education".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lewis (MN) amendment (A002) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Lewis (MN).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lewis (MN) amendment (A002) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Lewis (MN) amendment (A002) Agreed to without objection.
